ygData.subject: Re: languages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you re 27 and don t have an FBR and at least one or two other special clothing items, you re doing something wrong. Unless you re on a new server. --
ygData.messageBody:
PHAEDRA WHITLOCK wrote:
>
> From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
>
> I wish!
>
> Actually Im a precocious lvl 27 unable to power level worth a darn. :) I am also a master smith, baker, swimmer, and halfway there on Tailoring and Fletching. I just like knowledge.
>
> Now if I could just get my Research to go up and get something to wear besides silk...
>
> --Shannyn of Tunare server
>

If you're 27 and don't have an FBR and at least one or two other special
clothing items, you're doing something wrong.

Unless you're on a new server.

--
Sergey

"Zed wantd nookie and the brother of brothers blame her for the
destruction of their planet."
-Dan Tropea
